price.quotes-subtitle: Create, manage and send price quotes to potential clients.

price.quote.disclaimer: Note: Any subsequent invoice created automatically or manually after a customer approves this price quote is not a tax invoice. You are solely responsible for ensuring that the invoice you issue conforms to the legal requirements applicable to you and your customers.
price.quote.new.tax.tooltip: If you want to add a second tax rate to this item, set it here.

business-info.dialog.title: Your Business Info
business-info.dialog.content: Your business info will appear on the top of every price quote. You can always edit your details or enter additional details in Settings.
business-info.dialog.footnotes: To enable automatic invoicing when a customer accepts a price quote, and to manage more settings, go to Price Quote
business-info.dialog.business-name.label: Business Name
business-info.dialog.logo.label: Your Logo
business-info.dialog.checkbox: Automatically create invoices for accepted price quotes
business-info.dialog.checkbox.tooltip: Check this option to automatically send an invoice to the customer after they accept a price quote. If unchecked, you can manually convert quotes into invoices from your price quotes list.

ascend_upgrade_popover.message_3: Get advanced features from all the Ascend products, like Chat and Email Marketing
ascend_upgrade_popover.footer_hint: Your plan: {{plan}}. Upgrade for more capabilities.

ascend_upgrade.item_2: Send customers automated reminders when quotes are expiring
ascend_upgrade.item_3: Get more business tools like Automations, Chat and more
